name: end-to-end-tests
description: End-to-end tests for the account management frontend.

scripts.test: npm run build && docker run -t -v `pwd`:/end-to-end-tests --network="host" frontend-end-to-end-tests
scripts.test:update-snapshots: npm run build && docker run -t -v `pwd`:/end-to-end-tests --network="host" frontend-end-to-end-tests update-snapshots
scripts.test:ui: npm ci && npm run install-browsers && bddgen && playwright test --ui --ignore-snapshots
